channel.title: Jutsu XP vs. Daily Ranking
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Jutsu XP vs. Daily Ranking"

item.title: Re: Jutsu XP vs. Daily Ranking
item.content:encoded: You can't do 'Adventures in the Other Side' without Hermano or Fletch, which requires Jonin. But even if you could, the jutsus besides 'Leek Spin' require you being Jonin to learn them.

item.title: Re: Jutsu XP vs. Daily Ranking
item.content:encoded:
Actually, If you do Adventures in the other side you can learn all the jutsu without jonin. (Robogirl, Mister Six, Shorty lvl 2)

It's just cheaper to learn when you get fletch.

item.title: Re: Jutsu XP vs. Daily Ranking
item.content:encoded: Jutsu teached by allies that you can only get once you are Jonin! So Mr Tea can be obtained (pre-Jonin) just by brute-forcing the mission.

item.title: Re: Jutsu XP vs. Daily Ranking
item.content:encoded:
All of the missions on the Mr Tea question have auto-win justus. Range isn't required. Check the wiki for details.

Annie is level up on the B-rank mission 'Teach a Class'.

item.title: Re: Jutsu XP vs. Daily Ranking
item.content:encoded:
how do u get annie?

and my range isn't high enough to get mr.tea

item.title: Re: Jutsu XP vs. Daily Ranking
item.content:encoded:
Annie lvl 2 nicely replaces Pandabear (1 or 2). Making the new team Annie lvl 2, Timmy (2), and Pinky lvl 2/Stalkergirl (2). Personally, I prefer Pinky for the extra reduction in chakra cost.

So yes, the Jonin mission got harder, briefly, before Annie lvl 2 came around.

item.title: Re: Jutsu XP vs. Daily Ranking
item.content:encoded: I managed to get Jonin also……had to raid the village a bit, but restocked it with my own stuff and had to give up my necklac of the hokage.

item.title: Re: Jutsu XP vs. Daily Ranking
item.content:encoded: The only real difference between a Jonin run and a Sanin run is that Arena Favorite doesn't work with a Jonin run. (Actually it works fine, it just doesn't help.)

item.title: Re: Jutsu XP vs. Daily Ranking
item.content:encoded: I just did my jonin exam run this morning. It was technically not that much harder. I had 183 stamina left when I hit 500k daily xp ranking. Plenty for me to complete the exam easily. I did use a 21 day bonus, the weekly bonus, 50 spar bonus, and +100 stamina ramen though.

item.title: Re: Jutsu XP vs. Daily Ranking
Re: Jutsu XP vs. Daily Ranking
item.content:encoded: I was asking about the 500k EXP part of the Jonin exam not Sanin…..

item.title: Re: Jutsu XP vs. Daily Ranking
item.content:encoded:
Mr. Smith was never worth using. He didn't provide any ranking. The real news is that Panda is now not very good for Sannin runs.

Best team is probably Mister Tea (3), Timmy 2, and Pinky 2. In season 1, Timmy 2, Pinky 2 and Stalker 2.

item.title: Jutsu XP vs. Daily Ranking
item.content:encoded:
Jutsu XP vs. Daily Ranking:We have ironed out the XP/AP bonus vs. Daily XP inaccuracies. If a bonus gives you a general XP/AP bonus, then it counts for Ranking. If not (a Gen bonus, a JXP bonus, etc), it doesn't.

Does that mean that my current team of, Mr.Smith, Timmy lvl2, Pandalvl2 will no longer give me the good bonus ranking im needing? Does this mean that the jonin exam season 2 500k exp part just got harder?
